ï»¿OFFICIAL 1 7 Q7 / "' / DOCUMENTS The World Bank 1818 H 1 treet N.W. (202) 473-1000 INTERNATIONAL BANK FOR RECONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT Washing on, D.C. 20433 Cable Address: INTBAFRAD INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION U.S.A. Cable Address: INDEVAS Date: j f k c. Mr. Adam Bouloukos Director, Switzerland Operations Center United Nations Office for Project Services (UNOPS) 11-13 Chemin des Anemones 1219 Chatelaine Geneva, Switzerland Amendment No. 2 to the Administration Agreement between the United Nations Office for Project Services and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development and the International Development Association concerning the Enhanced Integrated Framework World Bank Managed Trust Fund (TF 071511) Dear Mr. Bouloukos: I. We refer to the Administration Agreement between the United Nations Office for Project Services (hereinafter referred to as "UNOPS" or the "Donor"), as trust manager of the Enhanced Integrated Framework ("ElF") and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) and the International Development Association (IDA), (collectively, the "Bank") regarding the Enhanced Integrated Framework World Bank Managed Trust Fund (TF 071511) (the "Trust Fund") effective April 19, 2011, as amended on October 19, 2011 (the "Administration Agreement"). 2. Pursuant to recent discussions between the Bank and the Donor, the Bank proposes to amend paragraph 10.1 of the Administration Agreement to extend the end disbursement date to October 31, 2015, to read as follows: Paragraph 10.1: "10.1. It is expected that the Contributions will be fully disbursed by the Bank by October 31, 2015. The Bank shall only disburse Contributions for the purposes of this Agreement after such date with the written approval of the Donor." 3. All other terms of the Administration Agreement shall remain the same. 4. The Bank will disclose this Amendment and related information on this Trust Fund in accordance with the World Bank Policy on Access to Information. By entering into this Amendment, the Donor consents to disclosure of this Amendment and related information on this Trust Fund. RCA 248423. LJ WUI 64145 II FAX (202) 477-6391
ï»¿5. We propose that this letter shall constitute Amendment No. 2 to the Administration Agreement between the Bank and the Donor. Please confirm your acceptance to the foregoing, on behalf of the Donor, by signing and dating the two originals, retaining one original for your records and returning the other original to the Bank. Upon receipt by the Bank of the original Amendment No. 2 countersigned by you, this Amendment No. 2 will become effective as of the date of the countersignature. Sincerely, INTERNATIONAL BANK FOR RECONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ern,.iAd koekman Director International Trade Department CONFIRMED AND AGREED: UNITED NATIONS OFFICE FOR PROJECT SERVICES ACTING AS THE TRUST FUND MANAGER FOR THE EIF By: Date: Adam Bouloukos Director, Switzerland Operations Center, UNOPS
